title: How to Make a Basic Automatic Room Door Closer

steps.title: Make sure you have everything you need.
steps.content: Make sure you have everything you need. See the list below.

steps.title: Make a hole on the cap of the water bottle with the nail and the hammer.
steps.content: Make a hole on the cap of the water bottle with the nail and the hammer.

steps.title: Make a knot on one end of the wire.
steps.content: Make a knot on one end of the wire.

steps.title: Insert the other end of the wire into the hole made in the cap.
steps.content: Insert the other end of the wire into the hole made in the cap. Guide the wire through the cap up to the knot and ensure that the knot doesn't pass through the hole. If it passes, then make a bigger knot. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Close the bottle with the cap.
steps.content: Close the bottle with the cap.

steps.title: Hammer a nail on the upper part of the door frame near the tower bolt.
steps.content: Hammer a nail on the upper part of the door frame near the tower bolt. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tie the spare end of the wire to the nail.
steps.content: Tie the spare end of the wire to the nail.

steps.title: Change the angle of clamp to about 135°.
steps.content: Change the angle of clamp to about 135°.

steps.title: Fix the pulley/bobbin to the clamp with a bolt/metal wire.
steps.content: Fix the pulley/bobbin to the clamp with a bolt/metal wire. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Secure the clamp to the upper middle part of the shutter with nails.
steps.content: Secure the clamp to the upper middle part of the shutter with nails. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Put the hanging wire and bottle setup over the pulley.
steps.content: Put the hanging wire and bottle setup over the pulley.

steps.title: Open the water bottle and fill it with water.
steps.content: Open the water bottle and fill it with water. [5] X Research source

steps.title: When you fill the bottle with water it pulls the door and shuts with a bang.
steps.content: When you fill the bottle with water it pulls the door and shuts with a bang. To avoid it cut some thermocol pieces or eraser or sponge pieces according to the door rebate where the door hits and stops.

steps.title: Your automatic door shutter is ready!
steps.content: Your automatic door shutter is ready!
